Title: PhoneFlipMenu Control for Windows Phone
Description: A control that mimics the behaviour of the Email app's reply/reply all/forward menu.

More info

The Windows Phone Mail app has, when youâ€™re in an email, a respond button which when tapped, brings up three further options, as illustrated below:
 

On the left we have the icons on the application bar, tap the respond button (on the left) and you get the options as shown in the picture on the right.

There is, however, no way of doing that in your own apps, so I created this control that does it.

To use the control, please see the instructions.

Project Credits
